mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hot_deal (business_no, discount_price, end_date, start_date) VALUES (#{businessNo}, #{discountPrice}, #{endDate}, #{startDate})
mapper.select: SELECT business_no AS businessNo, discount_price AS discountPrice, end_date AS endDate, start_date AS startDate, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt, store_address AS storeAddress, store_name AS storeName FROM ( SELECT * FROM hot_deal H JOIN promotion_board P ON H.business_no = P.business_no JOIN master M ON H.business_no = M.business_no ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT business_no AS businessNo, discount_price AS discountPrice, end_date AS endDate, start_date AS startDate, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt, store_address AS storeAddress, store_name AS storeName FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, t_hotDeal.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM hot_deal H JOIN promotion_board P ON H.business_no = P.business_no JOIN master M ON H.business_no = M.business_no ) t_hotDeal) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})
